summary: Tivadar Csontváry Kosztka the one-ideaed Hungarian painter was thought to be crazy by his peers, but he eventually became a significant artist.
cast: Itschak Fintzi|István Holl|Andrea Drahota|Margit Dajka|Ágnes Bánfalvy|Judit András|Samu Balázs|Gáspár Ferdinándy|István Fillár|Gyula Gerencsér|Zoi Karandatha|Zsuzsa Kocsák|Margit Lontay|Eleni Martinelli|László Márkus|László Méhes|Mihály Móré|Mihályné Móré|Rudolf Olaszi|Iván Palkovics|Ádám Rajhona|Eleni Taxidu|Hédi Temessy|Éva Vágréti|Emperor Franz Josef
title: Csontváry
